name: Mitra
description:
Vous devez sélectionner un niveau de difficulté.

You lose the game if 12 paratroopers successfully escape in the easy level.

You lose the game if 8 paratroopers successfully escape in the medium level.
You lose the game if 6 paratroopers manage to escape in the hard level.
You can collect bullets if you explode crates.
You can collect bullets by watching an advertising video.
If you prefer a game without advertising you can buy the game by clicking on the button (no Ads).
Good luck (Sas DAS from Studio Haftas)
